# This file contains configuration parameters for
# Information Source test 10144
# The only values the user should edit
# are
#  URLPrefix
#  documentUID
#  preferredContentType

# User of test 10144 should edit these three entries
URLPrefix = http://info-src:8080
documentUID = 1.2.840.113654.2.3.2003.100.104
preferredContentType = application/pdf

# Do not edit below this line
# Query Keys
requestType = DOCUMENT

# HTTP Request Fields
#Accept = image/jpeg
#Accept = application/pdf
Accept = application/pdf, image/jpeg
